title: Gravity Screen - On Off v1.81.0 Modded [=Rahil=] apk (pro unlock
description:
Presenting

Gravity Screen - On/Off v1.81.0 (Modded)


Root Needed?


=>No

[b]What does this app do ?

=> This app is the best app to save your power button read features for more

Features of Gravity screen on - off :

FREE FEATURES

- Pocket Sensor: Recognizes if your phone is in your pocket. 
- Table Sensor: Detects your phone is lying on a table.
- Turn Screen Off by Proximity: activates the proximity sensor before turning the screen off.
- Turn Screen On by Motion: If the screen is off and it's facing up the device can be woken up by any movements, for example by lifting up by hand. Usage of the power button can interferes with this option.
- Keep Screen On by Motion: It keeps the screen on by relying on the small movements you are doing by your hand while holding the phone. If motions are detected while the screen is facing up, it keeps the screen on because it can be suspected that the phone is held and probably you are reading something. If the phone is steady it will turn the screen off normally no matter the position you leave your device. It's especially helpful if your lock key is hard to reach or if the power button is broken.
- Tasker, Llama, Locale supported by plug-in.

IN-APP PURCHASE FEATURES

- Wider range in Table Sensor
- Turn Screen On by Motion Timeout can be set above 15 minutes
- Exclude Apps option: The app pauses itself anytime if selected app is running, it'll resume when you close the app. Useful when playing games etc.
- Widgets, PowerToggles plug-in

VERSIONS: FREE vs. PRO vs. UNLOCKED by IN-APP PURCHASE (recommended)

In the Pro version, there is no 15 minutes limit for turning the screen on by motion and the Table sensor can be set more precisely. Unlocked version has everything what Pro has, plus it has an Exclude App list, a more advanced Delayed lock option and Widgets.

Features of this mod 

*In app purchases bought by default
*Themed pure black & white

Instructions 

*Uninstall Previous Version
*Download it
*Install APK
*Set as device administrator
*Enjoy
